short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize ordering and reviewing experience for Amazon Vine Users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Highly customizable interface
* Product alerts in the browser
* Themes
* Bookmarking
* Hide Products
* Custom highlights, hiding and alerts
* Rocket Order button
* Infinite-loading fix
* Share products with Brenda from the browser
* Pre-select your delivery address
* Cutting-edge design
* ETV, timestamp, country flag, star rating, limited, colors, sizes, options, coupons and discounts listed on the page
* Custom orders and reviews page
* Share Loot/Swag bag and RFY Summary direct to Discord!
* Webhooks (Integration with google sheets, home assistant, etc)
* Order tagging to organize your inventory
* A lot more to come.
